info.title: HRMS API
info.description: This API handles all HRMS (Human Resource Management System) operations, including employee management, attendance, and payroll.

post.summary: Create a new user (employee) under the admin's company

get.summary: Get the company details for the authenticated admin, including its users

404.description: Company not found for this user.

put.summary: Update the authenticated admin's company details

get.summary: List all attendances for the authenticated user's company
Get an attendance record by ID
List all logins for the authenticated user's company
Get a login record by ID
List all salaries for the authenticated user's company
Get a salary record by ID

post.summary: Create a company and its admin
post.description: Creates a new company along with an associated admin user.

409.description: Company name or admin email already exists

500.description: Failed to create company or admin

message.example: Failed to create company or admin.

get.description: Fetches the details of a company, including its associated users (e.g., admin).

parameters.name: companyId
parameters.description: The ID of the company to retrieve

get.description: Fetches a list of all companies with pagination, including associated users (e.g., admins).

get.summary: List all trainings for the authenticated user's company
Get a training record by ID

post.description: Authenticate a user and return a token.
